lrc.lyric:
[00:00.96]There's revival, and it's spreading
[00:05.22]Like a wildfire in my heart
[00:09.86]Sunday morning, Hallelujah
[00:14.43]And it's lasting all week long
[00:19.28]Can you hear it?
[00:21.35]Can you feel it?
[00:23.72]It's the rhythm of a gospel song
[00:28.30]Oh once you choose it, you can lose it
[00:33.24]There ain't nothing, there ain't nothing gonna steal my joy
[00:37.59]I got an Old Church Choir singing in my soul
[00:42.27]I got a sweet salvation and it's beautiful
[00:46.88]I've got a heart overflowing 'cause I've been restored
[00:52.10]There ain't nothing gonna steal my joy
[00:56.56]No there ain't nothing gonna steal my joy
[01:00.89]When the valleys, that I wander
[01:05.32]Turn to mountains, that I can climb
[01:09.80]Oh, You are with me, never leave me
[01:14.70]Oh 'cause, there ain't nothing there ain't nothing gonna steal my joy
[01:19.06]I got an Old Church Choir singing in my soul
[01:23.58]I got a sweet salvation and it's beautiful
[01:28.37]I've got a heart overflowing 'cause I've been restored
[01:33.66]There ain't nothing gonna steal my joy
[01:37.66]No there ain't nothing gonna steal my joy
[01:51.56]Clap your hands and stomp your feet
[01:54.10]'til you find that gospel beat
[01:56.25]'cause it's all you'll ever need
[01:59.08]All you'll ever need
[02:00.67]Clap your hands and stomp your feet
[02:02.98]'til you find that gospel beat
[02:05.31]'cause it's all you'll ever need
[02:08.11]All you'll ever need
[02:12.55]I've got an old church choir, singing in my soul
[02:16.85]I got a sweet salvation, and it's beautiful
[02:21.49]I got an Old Church Choir singing in my soul
[02:26.09]I got a sweet salvation and it's beautiful
[02:30.67]I've got a heart overflowing 'cause I've been restored
[02:35.81]There ain't nothing gonna steal my joy
[02:39.89]No there ain't nothing gonna steal my joy
[02:44.94]Oh there ain't nothing gonna steal my joy
